name: search-website-functions-v4
description: This sample is a React template for [Azure Cognitive Search](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/search/search-what-is-azure-search). It leverages the [Azure SDK for Javascript/Typescript](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-js/tree/master/sdk/search/search-documents/) and [Azure Static Web Apps](https://aka.ms/swadocs) to make it easy to get up and running with a simple web application. It includes a search page with faceted navigation, a search bar for free form search and suggested queries, and tabbed page results.
